Just install the patches and copy my folder over yours

It's probably a bit late but as a non-native english speaker i could perhaps turn it otherwise for noswad. Correct me if i'm wrong. (i didn't downloaded this torrent).

- After having installed the game, replace the "WormsArmageddon" folder on your computer by the one on the iso (downloaded game). In other words, copy the files of the game you downloaded (and  mounted as an iso with Daemontools for exemple) and paste them in the folder of the game you already have. click "yes to all" to replace the old files.
This is in case you want to play it with all options and weapons unlocked by Creative_MFS in his saved games.
